00033 #define TEST_DATA_ALL_COLUMN_TYPES "../data/test.file.data_all_column_types"

00039 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes );
00040 
00041 DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes()
00042 {
00043         data = 0;
00044         dataPlane = 0;
00045 }

00049

00052 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::setUp()
00053 {
00054         // Open one DataSet.
00055         data = new GenericData;
00056         GenericFileReader reader;
00057         std::string name = TEST_DATA_ALL_COLUMN_TYPES;
00058         reader.SetFilename(name);
00059         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00060         try
00061         {
00062                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,0); // there is only one DataSet
00063         }
00064         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00065         {
00066                 dataPlane = 0;
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::tearDown()
00071 {
00072         if (dataPlane)
00073                 dataPlane->Delete();
00074         delete data;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::testCreation()
00078 {
00079         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::testOpenDataSet()
00084 {
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 void DataSetTest_AllColumnTypes::testAccessColumnValues()
00091 {
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00093 
00094         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00095         //int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00096 
00097         // types to receive values.
00098         int8_t b;
00099         u_int8_t ub;
00100         int16_t s;
00101         u_int16_t us;
00102         int32_t i;
00103         u_int32_t ui;
00104         std::string str;
00105         std::wstring wstr;
00106         float f;
00107 
00108         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00109         {
00110                 // expected values
00111                 char expected_str[10];
00112                 wchar_t expected_wstr[15];
00113                 int8_t expected_b = 1+10*row;
00114                 u_int8_t expected_ub = 2+10*row;
00115                 sprintf(expected_str, "%d", 3+10*row);
00116                 int16_t expected_s = 4+10*row;
00117                 u_int16_t expected_us = 5+10*row;
00118                 int32_t expected_i = 6+10*row;
00119                 u_int32_t expected_ui = 7+10*row;
00120                 FormatString1(expected_wstr, 15, L"%d", 8+10*row);
00121                 float expected_f = (float)(9+10*row);
00122 
00123                 // Get and check the values
00124                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, b));
00125                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b == expected_b);
00126                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 1, ub));
00127                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ub == expected_ub);
00128                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 2, str));
00129                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(str == expected_str);
00130                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 3, s));
00131                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(s == expected_s);
00132                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 4, us));
00133                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(us == expected_us);
00134                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 5, i));
00135                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(i == expected_i);
00136                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 6, ui));
00137                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ui == expected_ui);
00138                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 7, wstr));
00139                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(wstr == expected_wstr);
00140                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 8, f));
00141                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(f == expected_f);
00142         }
00143 
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00145 
00146 }
